sen.j: 古代の宇智郡の地であり、宇智神社を始め、大和に移住させられた阿田隼人が祭った阿陀比売神社（旧・阿陀郷）などの延喜式内社が鎮座する。
sen.e: It used to be Uchi District in ancient times, and there are shrines based on the Engishiki (an ancient book for codes and procedures on national rites and prayers), including Uchi-jinja Shrine and Adahime-jinja Shrine (former Ada-go) dedicated by Hayato ADA who was forced to move to Yamato Province.

sen.j: 南北朝時代の1348年に南朝の本拠地である吉野が陥落した際に、後村上天皇が賀名生（現在の五條市西吉野町）に入り、一時期南朝が置かれた。
sen.e: When Yoshino, the base of the Southern Court (Japan) surrendered in 1348 in the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan), the Emperor Gomurakami entered Ano (currently Nishiyoshino Town, Gojo City) and the Southern Court was placed temporarily.

sen.j: 1600年に松倉重政が関ヶ原の戦いの論功で領土を与えられ、大和五条藩（現在の五條市二見）が成立、江戸時代に入り1616年に重政が島原藩に移封されるまで存続した。
sen.e: In 1600, Shigemasa MATSUKURA was awarded a territory as a conferral of honors in the Battle of Sekigahara, and Yamato Gojo Domain (currently Futami, Gojo City) was established and survived until Shigemasa was transferred to Shimabara Domain in 1616 in the Edo period.

sen.j: 重政は五条藩では城下町である新町の振興に努めてその後の繁栄の基礎を作った。
sen.e: Shigemasa made efforts to promote Shinmachi, a castle town in Gojo Domain and created the base of the prosperity thereafter.

sen.j: しかし、島原藩移封後は圧政を敷き島原の乱の原因を作った。
sen.e: Shigemasa made efforts to promote Shinmachi, a castle town in Gojo Domain and created the base of the prosperity thereafter, however, he laid a tyranny after he was transferred to Shimabara Domain, which caused the Shimabara War.

Shigemasa made efforts to promote Shinmachi, a castle town in Gojo Domain and created the base of the prosperity thereafter. However, he was the cause of much tyranny after he was transferred to Shimabara Domain, and that led to the Shimabara War.

sen.j: その後、江戸幕府の天領となり、1795年に五條代官所が設置された。

sen.j: 天気予報の発表区分および気象警報・注意報の発表区分について、合併前の五條市域と旧吉野郡西吉野村域は「奈良県全域 > 奈良県北部 > 奈良県五條・北部吉野」。
sen.e: With respect to weather report classifications, and other warnings and advisories, the pre-merger Gojo City area and the former Nishi-yoshino Village area in Yoshino County belong to the 'whole area of Nara Prefecture –> the northern part of Nara Prefecture -> Gojo and the northern part of Yoshino, Nara Prefecture.'
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理ＮＣによって二文に分けられていたので分割しました。全角符号を半角に訂正District→County「」内が原文と合わなくなっていたので訂正しました。

sen.j: 旧吉野郡大塔村域は「奈良県全域 > 奈良県南部 > 奈良県南西部」である。
sen.e: With respect to the classifications to issue weather forecast, weather warning and advisory, Gojo City area before the merger and the former Nishi-yoshino Village area in Yoshino District belong to the 'whole area of Nara Prefecture – northern part of Nara Prefecture – Gojo, northern part of Yoshino, Nara Prefecture,' while the former Oto Village area in Yoshino District belongs to the 'whole area of Nara Prefecture – southern part of Nara Prefecture – southwestern part of Nara Prefecture.'
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: With respect to weather report classifications, and other warnings and advisories, the pre-merger Gojo City area and the former Nishi-yoshino Village area in Yoshino District belong to the 'whole area of Nara Prefecture – northern part of Nara Prefecture, namely Gojo, in the northern part of Yoshino, Nara Prefecture.' The former Oto Village area in Yoshino District belongs to the 'whole area of Nara Prefecture -> the southern part of Nara Prefecture –> southwestern part of Nara Prefecture.'
The former Oto Village area in Yoshino County belongs to 'the whole area of Nara Prefecture -> the southern part of Nara Prefecture –> southwestern part of Nara Prefecture.'
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理District→County全角符号を半角に訂正

sen.j: 合併後も区分変更は行われていないために同じ五條市内で天気予報の発表区分および警報・注意報の発表区分が2つある。
sen.e: Since a revision of the classifications has not made even after the merger, there are two classifications to issue weather forecast, weather warning and advisory in the same Gojo City.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Since a revision of the classifications has not made even after the merger, there are two classifications to issue weather forecast, weather warning and advisory in the same Gojo City.
Since a revision of the classifications has not made even after the merger, there are two classifications to issue weather forecast, weather warning and advisory in the same Gojo City.

sen.j: いわゆる「平成の大合併」で天気予報の発表区分や気象警報・注意報の発表区分を2つ以上持つ市町村が数多く発生している。
sen.e: Because of the so-called 'great merger of municipalities in the Heisei era,' there appeared many cities, towns and villages having two or more classifications to issue weather forecast, weather warning and advisory, however, this Gojo City has been only one in either of the classifications in Nara Prefecture as of November, 2008.

Because of the so-called 'great merger of municipalities in the Heisei era,' there were many cities, towns and villages that had two or more classifications for weather forecast, weather warning and advisories. However, Gojo City has been only one in either of the classifications in Nara Prefecture as of November, 2008.

Due to the so-called 'great merger of municipalities in the Heisei period,' many cities, towns and villages ended up with two or more classifications for weather forecast, weather warning, and advisories.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理ＮＣによって二文に分けられていたので分割しました。全角符号を半角に訂正were→arehad→haveera→period

sen.j: しかし、2008年（平成20年）11月現在、奈良県内ではいずれもこの五條市のみとなっている。
sen.e: However, Gojo City is the only city in Nara Prefecture that has two or more classifications as of November 2008.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理文頭に「しかし」ｊを加えました。

sen.j: なお、衆議院選挙区は現在の五條市全域が「奈良4区」であり、これは合併前と変わっていない。
sen.e: Meanwhile, the whole area of current Gojo City belongs to the 'Nara No.4 District' as a constituency of the House of Representatives, which has not been changed from that before the merger.
Meanwhile, the whole area of current Gojo City belongs to the 'Nara No.4 District' as a constituency of the House of Representatives, which has not been changed from that before the merger.
